attributes.action: Remove our captured troops from Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having adamantly declared that our navy troops were not violating Iranian territory, why hasn't more pressure been applied to release our captured troops?

Iran are clearly delaying their release and have already broken promises to release the only female officer. It's time we stopped humouring them and - forcefully, if necessary - freed our captured troops.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
